title: Timmzzy
author: Timmzzy
content: please i would like to know, something regarding the forum even as have been here for a long time, i came across a warning ⚠  sign on a topic i was about to comment when i navigated to page 9 at the TRADING DISCUSSION . Does it mean we cant go back in time to comment on any topic, just need few explanationThanks...

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: You can comment, if your comment is necessary. It is just a warning that the thread is no more active. You know how the world changes, some threads needs to be left alone and to create another one to have more valid discussion. But if you know what you are doing is good and necessary, you can bring back old thread to live.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzy on June 14, 2023, 11:55:41 AMplease i would like to know, something regarding the forum even as have been here for a long time, i came across a warning ⚠  sign on a topic i was about to comment when i navigated to page 9 at the TRADING DISCUSSION . Does it mean we cant go back in time to comment on any topic, just need few explanationThanks...There's nothing to worry about that post since its just a reminder just like what @act said that thread is long time inactive. If you think your post is helpful or can change some perspective between some post or the thread itself then post it. But if your post is just nonsense and just want to post because you want to increase your post count then maybe think about more better than that since it doesn't give any good contribution if your intention is to post random matters.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: It would be better to create a new topic because the thread is not active anymore, or better read the old posts and maybe someone already answered your question. However, if you still insist on posting there and it's already been posted by someone else, then moderators will likely remove it.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzy on June 14, 2023, 11:55:41 AMDoes it mean we cant go back in time to comment on any topic, just need few explanationTopics that have already had a lot of comments and have stayed not replied to over a very long of time is very likely because almost all the possible aspects and perspectives to that discussion has been given and other users who have not commented but come across the discussion before and haven't commented probably read through and discovered that someone has already shared their view. If you are patient enough and you can take some time to read all the replies and responses from the first page to the last, there is a very high chance that you would see what you want to write, that is someone else has already written it and given the response.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzy on June 14, 2023, 11:55:41 AM Does it mean we cant go back in time to comment on any topic, just need few explanationYou can reply in old topics if your post brings some good insights or informative discussions.The warning is because too old topics, inactive topics likely are no longer good for discussions but it is not same for all cases. The message is clear, you have to decide that what you want to write is really needed for an inactive topic. If you see it is good, you can write and post it, nothing against you.

comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzy on June 14, 2023, 11:55:41 AMplease i would like to know, something regarding the forum even as have been here for a long time, i came across a warning ⚠  sign on a topic i was about to comment when i navigated to page 9 at the TRADING DISCUSSION . You can comment on it if it's really necessary for that same topic. Necro bumping is what you are gonna commit if you will continue to post with that warning since the topic is already abandoned by the OP.Quote from: Timmzzy on June 14, 2023, 11:55:41 AMDoes it mean we cant go back in time to comment on any topic, just need few explanationYou can always create a new thread specifically for discussion on that specific old thread as continuation of that topic. Bumping an old thread that already irrelevant to current time is useless and spam.

comments.body: One thing remains straight and vivid there.The fact that, its been a long time (although the time frame isn't specific) someone did make any post on the thread.This means, the thread could have been discussed to exhaustion and there was nothing more to be added to it.Still, your not prohibited to e further posts in te thread but rather, your warned to be sure your not just about beating a dead house.
